backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining authorization, blob storage mixins, user and artist profiles, lyrics, voice notes, snippets, and messaging with CRUD-style query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, structure, and interactions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global body styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global layout, theme provider, routes for all pages, and triggers profile setup modal after authentication.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and react-query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gate component that blocks access for unauthenticated users and shows a sign-in prompt unless a custom fallback is provided.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile-first layout with sticky header, bottom navigation, and active-route highlighting wrapped around page content.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileF: React form for editing a user profile, managing fields like display name, bio, genres, and social links, and submitting the formatted profile object.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for initial profile creation that collects display name and bio, then saves the profile using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, artist profiles, lyrics, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for global styling.
frontend/src/lib/rhyme/rhymeEngine.ts: Simple rhyme suggestion function that matches words by shared endings using a predefined word list.
frontend/src/lib/rhyme/wordlist.en.ts: Static list of common English words used for rhyme matching in the rhyme engine.
frontend/src/lib/templates/songTemplates: Defines a SongTemplate interface and exports preset song structure templates for use in the lyric editor.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist’s profile, genres, social links, and message button using fetched profile and snippet data.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Handles viewing and sending messages in a conversation thread, including local history storage and auto‑scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder discovery page with search input and a coming‑soon message for artist browsing.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Lists recent conversations saved in local storage and links to message threads, or shows an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/LyricEditorPage.tsx: Provides a full lyric editor with saving, updating, deleting, tagging, templates, and rhyme suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/LyricsLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user’s saved lyrics with search filtering, metadata, and navigation to individual lyric editing pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Profile page enabling artists to view and edit profile data and upload audio snippets with metadata and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceNotesPage.tsx: Voice note recording page supporting in-browser audio capture, playback, naming, and saving voice notes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the app theme.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app vision, features, architecture notes, and image requirements.
